EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM MongoDB and Spring: Two leaves of the same tree.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: MongoDB and Spring - Two leaves of the same tree
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar MongoDB and Spring: Two leaves of the same tree on Thursday, October 29, 2015.
Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, October 29, 2015 Time: 2:00PM Summer Time (London, GMT+01:00)
Join the Session <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1047754/4FF162B47652741ADFF0E837124645AA> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
